argument.name: Position
argument.description: The current location of the cursor in an RTF field.

page.description: The .GET_CURSOR() method returns the position of the cursor in an RTF Memo field. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example reports that the cursor is at position 17 in an RTF field in an open form.
section.example: dim obj as P obj = :Customer_Information:rtfmemofield.this obj.rtf.insert_text("This is RTF text") ? obj.rtf.get_cursor() = 17
